item.title: hugo搭建
item.author: Ylimhs
item.description: brew 文档 brew Linux安装文档 文档 前期准备 debian或者Ubuntu 1 sudo apt-get install build-essential procps curl file git 开始安装 1 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" 环境变量配置 1 2 3 4 test -d ~/.linuxbrew && eval $(~/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv) test
